data.actual_result: the payment type menu is smaller and has a small scrollbar, and the payment methods can't be seen without scrolling
data.expected_result: the payment type popup should show in its full size without any scrollbar
data.short_description: clicking back fast enough after selecting a payment method will break the payment type menu and show a scrollbar
data.steps_to_repro: - go to user settings - click on billing - click on "Add Payment Method - select a payment method and click back while the window is expanding (see attached gif)
